revisions.revision: Updated plugin from Halo 4 tag dump.

bit.name: Push To Spawn Enabled
bit.tooltip: allow loadout menu to delay spawn

int16.name: Loadout Menu Spawn Suppression Time
int16.tooltip: maximal time that the loadout menu can prevent respawn while up

int16.name: Loadout Menu Cooldown Time
int16.tooltip: cooldown time after loadout menu is dismissed before player spawns in

int16.name: Loadout Menu Initial Choice Time
int16.tooltip: time before players initially spawn in for choosing starting loadout

int16.name: Maximum Spawn Suppression Time
int16.tooltip: maximal time that a player can continue to delay his spawn by switching targets

enum32.name: Ready
enum32.tooltip: safe and ready to spawn - this value currently ignored

enum32.name: Waiting
enum32.tooltip: safe but waiting to spawn - this value currently ignored

enum32.name: Enemy Territory
enum32.tooltip: spawn target is inside enemy territory volumes

enum32.name: Teammate Damaged
enum32.tooltip: spawn target has recently taken damage

enum32.name: Enemy Nearby
enum32.tooltip: There is an enemy within the cylinder around the spawn target

enum32.name: Projectiles
enum32.tooltip: There are dangerous projectiles in the area
